column5: anyone ever fished this lake? heading up there for the first time and was wondering what to expect for fish. is it a good walleye lake? also if anyone that fished it could give me some pointers on what to use and maybe a couple spots they had luck. im going the first week of june and have never fished in canada before. thanks WW

If this is the lake that is about 45 min. southwest of Thunder Bay then it is more of a perch lake than anything else. Most of the lake is under ten feet deep with a deep hole on the west side of the island and a deep though on the far southwest shore. My fater-in-law goes each year in August for perch only and does catch an occasional walleye but they are small. Lake-link has a thread on a message board about the lake where you could also get some info.
i fished it few times i have found it over populated an the co's are out there like no tomorrow an well the fishing is not as great as other lakes around the area
Is anyone planning on going to whitefish lake this summer? Just curious on everyones thoughts of this lake. Thanks.
Odd that a shallow lake is named "Whitefish". Bill
I have never caught a whitefish there.
